Articles.Content:
Hey, will KSP be out for consoles in other countries other than the US or whoever has the game currently. 

It'll be great if you can do this!!

I'm pretty sure the plan was/is to have the game available in the same countries where it is available on PC... in other words, most of the countries on Earth. However, the console porting process didn't go quite as smoothly as Squad would have liked - probably the reason why they have a different contractor working on it now than originally Those issues may have delayed rollout in some regions (I honestly don't know where you can get it, I don't even have a console). Also, perhaps Squad is waiting until the localization & language support work they're doing right now is ready before making a big international release push...?

13 hours ago, Streetwind said:

-snip-

However, the console porting process didn't go quite as smoothly as Squad would have liked - probably the reason why they have a different contractor working on it now than originally

-snip-

So Flying Tiger didn't exactly work out, eh?  Can't say I'm all that surprised.  Hopefully BlitWorks (they're the current one, right?) has better luck!!

Edited February 13, 2017 by Slam_Jones
